response:

If I reject and propose in the next round, the total value will be worth 20% less to me (so $800,000 in equivalent value). Even if I were to propose a much more favorable split, Alice might reject, leading to further rounds and more value loss.

However, $100,000 out of $1,000,000 is only 10% of the total, which is too low to accept in the first round when I have leverage to make a counter-offer.

{"decision": "reject"}
